script_collections.script: CREATE TABLE Directory ( FullPath VARCHAR2 (250) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT PK_Directory PRIMARY KEY, Parent VARCHAR2 (250) )

CREATE TABLE "File" ( Name VARCHAR2 (200) NOT NULL, Directory VARCHAR2 (250) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT FK_File_Directory REFERENCES Directory (FullPath) ON DELETE CASCADE, "Size" NUMBER (18, 0) NOT NULL, Downloads INT NOT NULL, LastModified DATE NOT NULL, Data BLOB NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_File PRIMARY KEY (Name, Directory) )

CREATE TABLE Attachment ( Name VARCHAR2 (200) NOT NULL, Page VARCHAR2 (200) NOT NULL, "Size" NUMBER (18, 0) NOT NULL, Downloads INT NOT NULL, LastModified DATE NOT NULL, Data BLOB NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_Attachment PRIMARY KEY (Name, Page) )
CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER F_D_U_TR AFTER UPDATE OF FullPath ON Directory FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE "File" a SET a.Directory = :New.FullPath WHERE a.Directory = :Old.FullPath; END;
